org.apache.juneau.xml

Class XmlParserSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.Session
      • org.apache.juneau.BeanSession
        • org.apache.juneau.parser.ParserSession
          • org.apache.juneau.xml.XmlParserSession
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HtmlParserSession

    public class XmlParserSession
extends ParserSession
    Session object that lives for the duration of a single use of XmlParser.

    This class is NOT thread safe. It is meant to be discarded after one-time use.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Create a new session using properties specified in the context.

    • Constructor Detail

      • XmlParserSession

        public XmlParserSession(XmlParserContext ctx,
                        ObjectMap op,
                        Object input,
                        Method javaMethod,
                        Object outer,
                        Locale locale,
                        TimeZone timeZone,
                        MediaType mediaType)
        Create a new session using properties specified in the context.
        Parameters:
        ctx - The context creating this session object. The context contains all the configuration settings for this object.
        input - The input. Can be any of the following types:
        • null
        • Reader
        • CharSequence
        • InputStream containing UTF-8 encoded text.
        • File containing system encoded text.
        op - The override properties. These override any context properties defined in the context.
        javaMethod - The java method that called this parser, usually the method in a REST servlet.
        outer - The outer object for instantiating top-level non-static inner classes.
        locale - The session locale. If null, then the locale defined on the context is used.
        timeZone - The session timezone. If null, then the timezone defined on the context is used.
        mediaType - The session media type (e.g. "application/json").

    • Method Detail

        public final boolean isPreserveRootElement()
        Returns the XmlParserContext.XML_preserveRootElement setting value for this session.

      • getXmlStreamReader

        public final XMLStreamReader getXmlStreamReader()
                                         throws Exception
        Wrap the specified reader in a STAX reader based on settings in this context.
        Returns:
        The new STAX reader.
        Throws:
        Exception - If problem occurred trying to create reader.

      • decodeString

        public final String decodeString(String s)
        Decodes and trims the specified string.

        Any '_x####_' sequences in the string will be decoded.

        Parameters:
        s - The string to be decoded.
        Returns:
        The decoded string.

      • getElementName

        public final String getElementName(XMLStreamReader r)
                            throws XMLStreamException
        Returns the name of the current XML element.

        Any '_x####_' sequences in the string will be decoded.

        Parameters:
        r - The reader to read from.
        Returns:
        The decoded element name.
        Throws:
        XMLStreamException

      • getAttributeName

        public final String getAttributeName(XMLStreamReader r,
                                     int i)
                              throws XMLStreamException
        Returns the name of the specified attribute on the current XML element.

        Any '_x####_' sequences in the string will be decoded.

        Parameters:
        r - The reader to read from.
        i - The attribute index.
        Returns:
        The decoded attribute name.
        Throws:
        XMLStreamException

      • getAttributeValue

        public final String getAttributeValue(XMLStreamReader r,
                                      int i)
                               throws XMLStreamException
        Returns the value of the specified attribute on the current XML element.

        Any '_x####_' sequences in the string will be decoded.

        Parameters:
        r - The reader to read from.
        i - The attribute index.
        Returns:
        The decoded attribute value.
        Throws:
        XMLStreamException

      • getElementText

        public String getElementText(XMLStreamReader r)
                      throws XMLStreamException
        Returns the text content of the current XML element.

        Any '_x####_' sequences in the string will be decoded.

        Leading and trailing whitespace (unencoded) will be trimmed from the result.

        Parameters:
        r - The reader to read the element text from.
        Returns:
        The decoded text. null if the text consists of the sequence '_x0000_'.
        Throws:
        XMLStreamException

      • getText

        public String getText(XMLStreamReader r,
                      boolean trim)
               throws XMLStreamException
        Returns the content of the current CHARACTERS node.

        Any '_x####_' sequences in the string will be decoded.

        Leading and trailing whitespace (unencoded) will be trimmed from the result.

        Parameters:
        r - The reader to read the element text from.
        trim - If true, trim the contents of the text node BEFORE decoding escape sequences. Typically true for XmlFormat.MIXED_PWS and XmlFormat.TEXT_PWS.
        Returns:
        The decoded text. null if the text consists of the sequence '_x0000_'.
        Throws:
        XMLStreamException

      • getText

        public String getText(XMLStreamReader r)
               throws XMLStreamException
        Shortcut for calling getText(r, true);.
        Parameters:
        r - The reader to read the element text from.
        Returns:
        The decoded text. null if the text consists of the sequence '_x0000_'.
        Throws:
        XMLStreamException

      • getElementAsString

        public final String getElementAsString(XMLStreamReader r)
        Takes the element being read from the XML stream reader and reconstructs it as XML.

        Used when reconstructing bean properties of type XmlFormat.XMLTEXT.

        Parameters:
        r - The XML stream reader to read the current event from.
        Returns:
        The event as XML.
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - if the event is not a start or end tag.

      • parseText

        public String parseText(XMLStreamReader r)
                 throws XMLStreamException
        Parses the current element as text. Note that this is different than getText(XMLStreamReader) since it assumes that we're pointing to a whitespace element.
        Parameters:
        r -
        Returns:
        The parsed text.
        Throws:
        XMLStreamException

      • isWhitespaceElement

        public boolean isWhitespaceElement(XMLStreamReader r)
        Returns true if the current element is a whitespace element.

        For the XML parser, this always returns false. However, the HTML parser defines various whitespace elements such as "br" and "sp".

        Parameters:
        r - The XML stream reader to read the current event from.
        Returns:
        true if the current element is a whitespace element.

      • parseWhitespaceElement

        public String parseWhitespaceElement(XMLStreamReader r)
                              throws XMLStreamException
        Parses the current whitespace element.

        For the XML parser, this always returns null since there is no concept of a whitespace element. However, the HTML parser defines various whitespace elements such as "br" and "sp".

        Parameters:
        r - The XML stream reader to read the current event from.
        Returns:
        The whitespace character or characters.
        Throws:
        XMLStreamException

      • close

        public boolean close()
        Silently closes the XML stream.
        Overrides:
        close in class ParserSession
        Returns:
        true if this method wasn't previously called.
